remarks: The inner product of the reference vector ` E ` with itself is nonzero. This shows the inner product condition in the proof of Theorem 3.6 of [Holland95] p. 14 line 32, ` [ ` e , e ` ] =/= 0 ` is satisfied.  TODO: remove redundant hypothesis hdmapevec.j.  (Contributed by NM, 1-Jun-2015.)
statement:

hdmapevec.j $e |- J = ( ( HVMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapevec.s $e |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapevec.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hdmapevec2.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapevec2.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.

hdmapevec2 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( S ` E ) ` E ) = .1. ) $.
